text.section: A person may not shoot, kill, or maim a carrier pigeon.

A person may not entrap, catch, or detain a carrier pigeon that has:
the owner's name stamped on the carrier pigeon's wing or tail; or
a leg band that includes the owner's initials, name, or number.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $10 for each violation.
